description: [``botocore``] This release introduces support for Microsoft license included applications streaming.
[``botocore``] The AWS Backup job attribute extension enhancement helps customers better understand the plan that initiated each job, and the properties of the resource each job creates.
[``botocore``] SDK release for TaskTemplateInfo in Contact for DescribeContact response.
[``botocore``] Support creating scoped and trustedIdentityPropagation enabled connections.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for creating instant, point-in-time copies of EBS volumes within the same Availability Zone
[``botocore``] Move UntagResource API body member to query parameter

[``botocore``] SFTP connectors now support routing connections via customers' VPC. This enables connections to remote servers that are only accessible in a customer's VPC environment, and to servers that are accessible over the internet but need connections coming from an IP address in a customer VPC's CIDR range.
